title: Teachers strike after news of not receiving salary increase
author: Salem Brown
summary: The GTU plans to strike for 10 days following news that the government will not be raising their salaries for 2024.

title: Government in collaboration with Canadian University for educational opportunities
author: Salem Brown
summary: Toronto Metropolitan University is working with Guyana to provide courses to citizens of Guyana.

title: Jagdeo unfazed by attempts to block financing
author: News Room
summary: Vice President Dr. Bharrat Jagdeo on Thursday remained optimistic that the loan from the U.S. Exim Bank will be secured in 2024.

title: Government provides clarity regarding banning of Skeng
author: News Room
summary: ‘Skeng’ banned from performing publicly, not at private events – Benn.

title: Bandits attack La Grange couple, cart off with $1M in valuables
author: News Room
summary: A couple living at Unity Road, La Grange, West Bank Demerara were on Thursday tied up and beaten by bandits.

title: Motorcyclist escapes after dropping haversack with 34 lbs of Ganja
author: News Room
summary: Police in Region Ten (Upper Demerara-Berbice) are on the hunt for a motorcyclist who escaped on Monday

title: Fire destroys house at Industry
author: News Room
summary: Three persons are now homeless after a fire, which was allegedly intentionally set, ripped through an Industry, East Coast Demerara (ECD) just after midday Thursday.

title: Monumental $600M project launched to develop Amerindian village plans
author: News Room
summary: A monumental project, valued at US$3M (or over G$600M) was Wednesday evening launched to help indigenous communities

title: Sprint legend Fraser-Pryce to retire after Paris 2024
author: News Room
summary: Three-time Olympic champion Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce says she owes it to her family to retire after the 2024 Games.
